Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to providing resources for adequate legal counsel to homeowners at risk of foreclosure
Summary: Provides resources for adequate legal counsel to homeowners at risk of foreclosure by including the web address to the attorney directory database in the notice given by a loan servicer, assignee or lender to the borrower.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to providing resources for adequate legal counsel to homeowners
